bug.author: tiru1930
bug.summary: kubeflow delete deployment is re-creating the deployment
bug.description:
/kind bug When I delete the deployment it is re-creating it, ideally it should not. My deployment is kfserving-yaml file Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): Dashboard v2.0.0-beta8+0.g4275399 General-purpose web UI for Kubernetes clusters kfctl version: (use kfctl version): kfctl_k8s_istio.v1.0.2.yaml Kubernetes platform: minikube Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version): Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"17", GitVersion:"v1.17.3", GitCommit:"06ad960bfd03b39c8310aaf92d1e7c12ce618213", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2020-02-11T18:14:22Z", GoVersion:"go1.13.6", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"} Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"17", GitVersion:"v1.17.3", GitCommit:"06ad960bfd03b39c8310aaf92d1e7c12ce618213", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2020-02-11T18:07:13Z", GoVersion:"go1.13.6", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
